Experience

AI/ML Intern

Dvara Solutions
This project aims to develop an AI-driven system to empower wealth managers by allowing them to pose questions in their native language, facilitating real-time matching with appropriate responses.
  • Processed and matched questions with real-time, language-specific responses, streamlining the learning process for wealth managers during their initial training period.
  • Developed a web platform using the Langchain framework, Python, React.js, and FAST APIs. The platform streamlines user interactions for document uploads and inquiries.
  • Implemented a robust system for text extraction, generating embeddings with a Large Language Model (LLM), and storing them in a vector database (Chromadb, FAISS) for efficient similarity-based query responses.
  • Actively evaluated and optimized the LLM while exploring NLP techniques for context and query enrichment.
  • Explored voice-to-text conversion technologies for Indian Native Languages

Projects

Voice OTP Authentication

Supervisor : Prof. Gayathri Ananthanarayanan

This project is about developing the Voice OTP Authentication System which is an advanced user verification system that employs both the unique characteristics of a speaker's voice and the dynamic nature of OTPs generated from uttered audio. This innovative approach enhances security by requiring users to authenticate themselves through a combination of their distinct voice patterns and a one-time password (OTP) extracted from the audio of the uttered OTP.

Tech Stack Used : Programming language : Python | Webpage : Flask, HTML, CSS, JavaScript | Speaker Verification : ECAPA-TDNN Model | Digit Recognition : Vakyansh Model

January 2023 - Present

Custom Search Engine

Supervisor : Prof. Raghu Hudli & Prof. Nikhil Hegde

The project focuses on building a tailored search solution for navigating government websites with an emphasis on efficient data retrieval, indexing, and advanced natural language processing for improved search functionality.

Tech Stack Used : Programming Language: Python | Web Scraping: Beautiful Soup, NLTK | Search & Indexing: Elastic Search

August 2022 - December 2022
